Articles.Content:
Hello,

I've been playing KSP EE a lot lately -- I think the addition of delta-V makes it more manageable and even more fun.

However, I'm facing a very scary and annoying bug. My saved game (career mode) just won't load anymore. To be more specific: when I press "X" to load it in the "Continue saved game" window, the game freezes (although music keeps going for a little while) and the only thing I can do is to kill the application from the PS4 side bar.

Other aspects of the game seem to work fine. I can play scenarios, create new games, etc.

Additional info: I'm playing with radial preset and I have both extensions installed.

Any suggestion?

The career save that I lost last summer due to a corrupted save game file exhibits the same behavior if I attempt to load the file.  The game just simply freezes graphically with the music playing, requiring a hard stop of the application.

I know that isn't what you want to hear, but this version of the game is still, to this day, corrupting save game data (usually following a KSP crash, which is also common on the PS4).  I have seen it almost daily, but thankfully it's been a restored backup (minor loss in progress), and not a total loss again.

All the same, I frequently copy my save game data to the cloud.  Just in case.

Thanks for your answer. What's weird is that nothing unusual happened -- I mean no game crash or anything like that.

Do you think the file is lost forever, or a future patch might bring it back to life?

16 hours ago, pioneer6014 said:

Do you think the file is lost forever, or a future patch might bring it back to life?

 

The reason I haven't deleted my original career save is because I hold on to a sliver of hope that some day it will load.

It's been over a year, though, so take that for what it's worth.
